name: Radix Technologies
overview:
Radix Technologies began in 2006, with the vision to provide businesses with cost effective, user friendly, and robust on demand computing resources. Already a developer of a suite of on demand software application for the relocations and global logistics industries, we have extended our product offering with a new range of cloud infrastructure services.

Radix is a company dedicated to the satisfaction of our clients through innovative technology and faultless service. We understand the value of time and productivity and we understand the significance when these elements are lost. We expect our name to be synonymous with quality and we expect our service and products to reflect this. We know that a clients trust must be earned and we strive, every step of the way and with every action, to gain it.
